object_follower

The object_follower package

  • Homepage: http://wiki.ros.org/object_follower

object_follower - package for following TF

Package includes type hierarchy for creating different types of following TF algorithms. Currently implemented following in 2d space using tf publishing and move_base goal sending

This project is in alpha state currently, so use it at your own risk.
